title: China: Contemporary Linyi Escape Near Benghe River & People's Square
description:
Located in downtown Linyi, this modern hotel puts you in the heart of all the action. Hyatt Place Linyi People's Square boasts light-filled rooms and a well-equipped fitness centre, and is in close proximity to shopping streets and local eats. When you're done taking in the sights, stroll back to spacious comfort, with plush bedding, dedicated workspaces and contemporary ensuite bathrooms. 

Step outside and you’re not far from Linyi People’s Square, the city’s lively hub, and a short walk to Wanda Plaza for shopping and entertainment. History buffs can explore the nearby Linyi Museum and Former Residence of Wang Xizhi, while nature lovers will enjoy the leafy trails of People’s Park just around the corner.
offer_address: 9 Xinhua Road, Lanshan District, Linyi, Shandong 276000, China
